Class.Name: CALayer
Class.Description: An object that manages image-based content and allows you to perform animations on that content.

InstanceMethods.Name: init
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an initialized CALayer object.

InstanceMethods.Name: initWithLayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Override to copy or initialize custom fields of the specified layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: presentationLayer
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a copy of the presentation layer object that represents the state of the layer as it currently appears onscreen.

InstanceMethods.Name: modelLayer
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the model layer object associated with the receiver, if any.

InstanceMethods.Name: display
InstanceMethods.Description: Reloads the content of this layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: drawInContext:
InstanceMethods.Description: Draws the layer’s content using the specified graphics context.

InstanceMethods.Name: contentsAreFlipped
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean indicating whether the layer content is implicitly flipped when rendered.

InstanceMethods.Name: renderInContext:
InstanceMethods.Description: Renders the layer and its sublayers into the specified context.

InstanceMethods.Name: affineTransform
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an affine version of the layer’s transform.

InstanceMethods.Name: setAffineTransform:
InstanceMethods.Description: Sets the layer’s transform to the specified affine transform.

InstanceMethods.Name: addSublayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Appends the layer to the layer’s list of sublayers.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeFromSuperlayer
InstanceMethods.Description: Detaches the layer from its parent layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: insertSublayer:atIndex:
InstanceMethods.Description: Inserts the specified layer into the receiver’s list of sublayers at the specified index.

InstanceMethods.Name: insertSublayer:below:
InstanceMethods.Description: Inserts the specified sublayer below a different sublayer that already belongs to the receiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: insertSublayer:above:
InstanceMethods.Description: Inserts the specified sublayer above a different sublayer that already belongs to the receiver.

InstanceMethods.Name: replaceSublayer:with:
InstanceMethods.Description: Replaces the specified sublayer with a different layer object.

InstanceMethods.Name: setNeedsDisplay
InstanceMethods.Description: Marks the layer’s contents as needing to be updated.

InstanceMethods.Name: setNeedsDisplayInRect:
InstanceMethods.Description: Marks the region within the specified rectangle as needing to be updated.

InstanceMethods.Name: displayIfNeeded
InstanceMethods.Description: Initiates the update process for a layer if it is currently marked as needing an update.

InstanceMethods.Name: needsDisplay
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean indicating whether the layer has been marked as needing an update.

InstanceMethods.Name: addAnimation:forKey:
InstanceMethods.Description: Add the specified animation object to the layer’s render tree.

InstanceMethods.Name: animationForKey:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the animation object with the specified identifier.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeAllAnimations
InstanceMethods.Description: Remove all animations attached to the layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: removeAnimationForKey:
InstanceMethods.Description: Remove the animation object with the specified key.

InstanceMethods.Name: animationKeys
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns an array of strings that identify the animations currently attached to the layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: setNeedsLayout
InstanceMethods.Description: Invalidates the layer’s layout and marks it as needing an update.

InstanceMethods.Name: layoutSublayers
InstanceMethods.Description: Tells the layer to update its layout.

InstanceMethods.Name: layoutIfNeeded
InstanceMethods.Description: Recalculate the receiver’s layout, if required.

InstanceMethods.Name: needsLayout
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean indicating whether the layer has been marked as needing a layout update.

InstanceMethods.Name: resizeWithOldSuperlayerSize:
InstanceMethods.Description: Informs the receiver that the size of its superlayer changed.

InstanceMethods.Name: resizeSublayersWithOldSize:
InstanceMethods.Description: Informs the receiver’s sublayers that the receiver’s size has changed.

InstanceMethods.Name: preferredFrameSize
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the preferred size of the layer in the coordinate space of its superlayer.

InstanceMethods.Name: addConstraint:
InstanceMethods.Description: Adds the specified constraint to the layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: actionForKey:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the action object assigned to the specified key.

InstanceMethods.Name: convertPoint:fromLayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Converts the point from the specified layer’s coordinate system to the receiver’s coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: convertPoint:toLayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Converts the point from the receiver’s coordinate system to the specified layer’s coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: convertRect:fromLayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Converts the rectangle from the specified layer’s coordinate system to the receiver’s coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: convertRect:toLayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Converts the rectangle from the receiver’s coordinate system to the specified layer’s coordinate system.

InstanceMethods.Name: convertTime:fromLayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Converts the time interval from the specified layer’s time space to the receiver’s time space.

InstanceMethods.Name: convertTime:toLayer:
InstanceMethods.Description: Converts the time interval from the receiver’s time space to the specified layer’s time space

InstanceMethods.Name: hitTest:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns the farthest descendant of the receiver in the layer hierarchy (including itself) that contains the specified point.

InstanceMethods.Name: containsPoint:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns whether the receiver contains a specified point.

InstanceMethods.Name: scrollPoint:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initiates a scroll in the layer’s closest ancestor scroll layer so that the specified point lies at the origin of the scroll layer.

InstanceMethods.Name: scrollRectToVisible:
InstanceMethods.Description: Initiates a scroll in the layer’s closest ancestor scroll layer so that the specified rectangle becomes visible.

InstanceMethods.Name: shouldArchiveValueForKey:
InstanceMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean indicating whether the value of the specified key should be archived.

InstanceProperties.Name: delegate
InstanceProperties.Description: The layer’s delegate object.

InstanceProperties.Name: contents
InstanceProperties.Description: An object that provides the contents of the layer. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: contentsRect
InstanceProperties.Description: The rectangle, in the unit coordinate space, that defines the portion of the layer’s contents that should be used. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: contentsCenter
InstanceProperties.Description: The rectangle that defines how the layer contents are scaled if the layer’s contents are resized. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: contentsGravity
InstanceProperties.Description: A constant that specifies how the layer's contents are positioned or scaled within its bounds.

InstanceProperties.Name: opacity
InstanceProperties.Description: The opacity of the receiver. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: hidden
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean indicating whether the layer is displayed. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: masksToBounds
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean indicating whether sublayers are clipped to the layer’s bounds. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: mask
InstanceProperties.Description: An optional layer whose alpha channel is used to mask the layer’s content.

InstanceProperties.Name: doubleSided
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean indicating whether the layer displays its content when facing away from the viewer. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: cornerRadius
InstanceProperties.Description: The radius to use when drawing rounded corners for the layer’s background. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: borderWidth
InstanceProperties.Description: The width of the layer’s border. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: borderColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The color of the layer’s border. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: backgroundColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The background color of the receiver. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: shadowOpacity
InstanceProperties.Description: The opacity of the layer’s shadow. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: shadowRadius
InstanceProperties.Description: The blur radius (in points) used to render the layer’s shadow. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: shadowOffset
InstanceProperties.Description: The offset (in points) of the layer’s shadow. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: shadowColor
InstanceProperties.Description: The color of the layer’s shadow. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: shadowPath
InstanceProperties.Description: The shape of the layer’s shadow. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: style
InstanceProperties.Description: An optional dictionary used to store property values that aren't explicitly defined by the layer.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsEdgeAntialiasing
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean indicating whether the layer is allowed to perform edge antialiasing.

InstanceProperties.Name: allowsGroupOpacity
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean indicating whether the layer is allowed to composite itself as a group separate from its parent.

InstanceProperties.Name: filters
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of Core Image filters to apply to the contents of the layer and its sublayers. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: compositingFilter
InstanceProperties.Description: A CoreImage filter used to composite the layer and the content behind it. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: backgroundFilters
InstanceProperties.Description: An array of Core Image filters to apply to the content immediately behind the layer. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: minificationFilter
InstanceProperties.Description: The filter used when reducing the size of the content.

InstanceProperties.Name: minificationFilterBias
InstanceProperties.Description: The bias factor used by the minification filter to determine the levels of detail.

InstanceProperties.Name: magnificationFilter
InstanceProperties.Description: The filter used when increasing the size of the content.

InstanceProperties.Name: opaque
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean value indicating whether the layer contains completely opaque content.

InstanceProperties.Name: edgeAntialiasingMask
InstanceProperties.Description: A bitmask defining how the edges of the receiver are rasterized.

InstanceProperties.Name: geometryFlipped
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean that indicates whether the geometry of the layer and its sublayers is flipped vertically.

InstanceProperties.Name: drawsAsynchronously
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean indicating whether drawing commands are deferred and processed asynchronously in a background thread.

InstanceProperties.Name: shouldRasterize
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean that indicates whether the layer is rendered as a bitmap before compositing. Animatable

InstanceProperties.Name: rasterizationScale
InstanceProperties.Description: The scale at which to rasterize content, relative to the coordinate space of the layer. Animatable

InstanceProperties.Name: contentsFormat
InstanceProperties.Description: A hint for the desired storage format of the layer contents.

InstanceProperties.Name: frame
InstanceProperties.Description: The layer’s frame rectangle.

InstanceProperties.Name: bounds
InstanceProperties.Description: The layer’s bounds rectangle. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: position
InstanceProperties.Description: The layer’s position in its superlayer’s coordinate space. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: zPosition
InstanceProperties.Description: The layer’s position on the z axis. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: anchorPointZ
InstanceProperties.Description: The anchor point for the layer’s position along the z axis. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: anchorPoint
InstanceProperties.Description: Defines the anchor point of the layer's bounds rectangle. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: contentsScale
InstanceProperties.Description: The scale factor applied to the layer.

InstanceProperties.Name: transform
InstanceProperties.Description: The transform applied to the layer’s contents. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: sublayerTransform
InstanceProperties.Description: Specifies the transform to apply to sublayers when rendering. Animatable.

InstanceProperties.Name: sublayers
InstanceProperties.Description: An array containing the layer’s sublayers.

InstanceProperties.Name: superlayer
InstanceProperties.Description: The superlayer of the layer.

InstanceProperties.Name: needsDisplayOnBoundsChange
InstanceProperties.Description: A Boolean indicating whether the layer contents must be updated when its bounds rectangle changes.

InstanceProperties.Name: layoutManager
InstanceProperties.Description: The object responsible for laying out the layer’s sublayers.

InstanceProperties.Name: autoresizingMask
InstanceProperties.Description: A bitmask defining how the layer is resized when the bounds of its superlayer changes.

InstanceProperties.Name: constraints
InstanceProperties.Description: The constraints used to position current layer’s sublayers.

InstanceProperties.Name: actions
InstanceProperties.Description: A dictionary containing layer actions.

InstanceProperties.Name: visibleRect
InstanceProperties.Description: The visible region of the layer in its own coordinate space.

InstanceProperties.Name: name
InstanceProperties.Description: The name of the receiver.

TypeMethods.Name: layer
TypeMethods.Description: Creates and returns an instance of the layer object.

TypeMethods.Name: layerWithRemoteClientId:
TypeMethods.Description: Initializes a layer with a remote client ID.

TypeMethods.Name: needsDisplayForKey:
TypeMethods.Description: Returns a Boolean indicating whether changes to the specified key require the layer to be redisplayed.

TypeMethods.Name: defaultActionForKey:
TypeMethods.Description: Returns the default action for the current class.

TypeMethods.Name: defaultValueForKey:
TypeMethods.Description: Specifies the default value associated with the specified key.
